alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 19 at 1:50PM MST until August 20 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Parker Valley, Kofa, Yuma, Central La Paz County, Southeast Yuma County and Gila River Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Very difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects will become airborne. Moderate tree and minor structural damage possible.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central La Paz; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Parker Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma
